resources.string: Pinky Dry Cleaners Dryers And Dyers
Buchad Mohal, Sadar Bazar, Cantonment, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. 226002
We are delivering quality services since 1985.\nOur services includes:

- Drycleaning
- Washing (Clothes, Sofa, Curtains)
- Carpet Cleaning
- Saree Starch
- Dyeing Clothes
- Darning Clothes
- Ironing

One day delivery is also available
